snippet: The extremist organization Al Mourabitoun, which pledged allegiance to the Islamic State last week, issued a statement about the captive, a security guard who had been abducted on April 4.
abstract: Jihadist group Al Mourabitoun, which was once part of Al Qaeda network and has sworn allegiance to Islamic State, says it has captured Romanian citizen and will kill him if their demands are not met.
lead_paragraph: The extremist organization Al Mourabitoun, which pledged allegiance to the Islamic State last week, issued a statement about the captive, a security guard who had been abducted on April 4.

headline.main: Militant Group Says It Has Romanian Hostage
headline.print_headline: Militant Group Says It Has Romanian Hostage
